Section.Catchline: Refund or credit of taxes erroneously paid or illegally collected.

SectionBody.Text: When any taxes, interest, or penalties imposed by part I or part II of this chapter have been erroneously paid or illegally collected, the department may permit the terminal supplier, importer, exporter, or wholesaler within 1 year to take credit against a subsequent tax report for the amount of the erroneous or illegal amount overpaid, or such person may apply for refund as provided by s. 215.26.
